description: Test your knowledge about films, actors, and cinema

questions.question: Which movie won the Academy Award for Best Picture in 2020?
options: Once Upon a Time in Hollywood
questions.explanation: Parasite, the South Korean film directed by Bong Joon-ho, won Best Picture in 2020.

questions.question: Who directed the movie 'Titanic'?
questions.explanation: James Cameron directed Titanic (1997), which became one of the highest-grossing films of all time.

questions.question: Which Indonesian movie tells the story of 'Laskar Pelangi'?
questions.explanation: Laskar Pelangi (2008) is an Indonesian film based on the novel by Andrea Hirata.

questions.question: In which movie series would you find the character 'Luke Skywalker'?
questions.explanation: Luke Skywalker is a main character in the Star Wars movie series.

questions.question: Which animated movie features the song 'Let It Go'?
questions.explanation: 'Let It Go' is the famous song from Disney's Frozen (2013), sung by Elsa.

questions.question: Who played the character of Jack Sparrow?
questions.explanation: Johnny Depp played the iconic character Jack Sparrow in the Pirates of the Caribbean series.

questions.question: Which Indonesian director is known for 'The Raid' series?
questions.explanation: Gareth Evans, a Welsh director working in Indonesia, directed The Raid series.

questions.question: What is the highest-grossing movie of all time (as of 2023)?
questions.explanation: Avatar (2009) reclaimed the top spot after its re-release, becoming the highest-grossing film.

questions.question: Which movie features the famous quote 'May the Force be with you'?
questions.explanation: 'May the Force be with you' is an iconic quote from the Star Wars franchise.

questions.question: Who composed the music for most of Steven Spielberg's movies?
questions.explanation: John Williams has composed music for many Spielberg films including Jaws, E.T., and Indiana Jones.
